author: Reuters
title: Weakened Henri drenches U.S. Northeast, heightening flood threat - Reuters
description: Storm Henri, downgraded to a tropical depression, threatened to trigger flash floods in the U.S. Northeast on Monday after drenching the region over the weekend.

author: Eduardo Simões
title: Brazil military police commander fired after publicly supporting Bolsonaro, slamming rivals - Reuters
description: The governor of Brazil's Sao Paulo state on Monday fired a senior military police commander who publicly supported a march in favor of President Jair Bolsonaro and attacked rival politicians.
